ygData.subject: RE: trade question
ygData.msgSnippet: That s nice, but I ve been camping the predator for weeks and haven t got a shard and I can t seem to find anyone on Prexus willing to sell or trade one.
ygData.messageBody:
That's nice, but I've been camping the predator for weeks and haven't got a
shard and I can't seem to find anyone on Prexus willing to sell or trade
one. Additionally, I'm told that above 30 it starts to get resisted A LOT
and being of the 29th song... So given the shard seems out of the question:
Is a obsidian scimitar a good trade for a silvery war axe or should I hold
out for something better?

Taneran Dreamweaver
<Clan Jax>
Bard of the 29th song
Prexus

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Randy Keith [mailto:kalekona@...]
> Sent: Thursday, December 02, 1999 11:15 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] trade question
>
>
> From: Randy Keith <kalekona@...>
>
> I play a sort of new bard on Bertoxx.
>
> I am currently dual weilding Obsidian shards. This gives me two
> decent (6/25) weapons, that both proc a 30
> point damage.
>
> One problem is that these weapons cause more taunting with my
> songs than a lvl 26 Warrior I hunt with. =)
>
> Jeff Illian wrote:
>
> > From: "Jeff Illian" <jeff@...>
> >
> > I've been having stamina problems duel wielding an obsidian
> scimitar and a
> > dragoon dirk in long battles. I'm currently trying to figure
> out what to
> > replace the scimitar with, but I'm not all that sure of the
> trade value of
> > it. I've got an offer on the table of a Silvery War Axe for
> the Obsidian
> > Scimitar. Is this a good trade?
> >
> > > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to
> lol@... with the subject submissions.
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to
> lol@... with the subject submissions.
>
